description: This file defines a Spring Boot exception handler class 'AdditionalExceptionAdvice' that intercepts IllegalArgumentException exceptions and returns a standardized error response with HTTP 400 Bad Request status.

classes.name: AdditionalExceptionAdvice
classes.description: A controller advice class that handles IllegalArgumentException globally within the Spring application, returning a customized error response.

methods.name: handleIllegalArgument
methods.description: Handles IllegalArgumentException by returning a ResponseEntity with an error message and HTTP 400 status.
